title: The Lake district
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Alex Strasser
brief_description: The English Lake District, an unspoiled region of mountains and lakes in the north-west of England. Now a national park where climbing, walking, sailing, and fishing may be enjoyed, and pilgrims may pay homage to Wordsworth and the district which inspired him. Narrated by Michael Redgrave.
